data.actual_result: The padding remains the same, as if the second line didn't even exist. This fixes itself halfway down the line.
data.expected_result: The top/bottom padding on the message bar will be properly adjusted to accomodate the new line
data.short_description: Filling the message bar with a single character for 1.5 lines causes the top/bottom padding to be broken
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the message bar, in any channel you have the permission to do so - Hold shift (or turn on Caps Lock) - Hold down any of the letter keys (A, B, C, etc.) - Observe the padding when a new line is started
